entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023
